name: clipboard-registers
title: Clipboard Registers
description: Adds four “clipboard registers” so you can save multiple clipboard slots and cycle between them with hotkeys.
author: hashmaphooligan

commands.name: overview
commands.title: Register Overview
commands.subtitle: View and manage all clipboard registers
commands.description: View and manage all clipboard registers in a list with quick actions

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
